MODER PRIVACY STATEMENT \n Your privacy is important to Moder. This privacy statement provides information about the personal information that Moder collects, and the ways in which Moder uses that personal information.
Summary
This paragraph, which is in no way legally binding, highlights the main points of Moder\'s privacy statement. Like any digital service, Moder does collect user information in an attempt to better serve our users, match them with their interests, and improve the overall experience. Specifically: Collected Information: registration user data (username, IP address, email, etc), user preferences, user publications (photos, etc) Information Use: personalization of the mobile app, data analysis, marketing communications Moder respects the privacy rights of its users and strives to keep information confidential and information use constructive and positive.

Personal information collection
Moder may collect and use the following kinds of personal information:
information about your use of this mobile app (including user interests/preferences, post/rating frequency, tag frequencies); information that you provide using for the purpose of registering with the mobile app (including username, email address, IP address, age(optional), and gender (optional)); information that you post publicly (including photos and outfit tags).
Using personal information
Moder may use your personal information to:
administer this mobile app; personalize the mobile app for you; enable your access to and use of the mobile app services; publish information about you on the mobile app; process data analysis; send you marketing communications.
Where Moder discloses your personal information to its agents or sub-contractors for these purposes, the agent or sub-contractor in question will be obligated to use that personal information in accordance with the terms of this privacy statement.
In addition to the disclosures reasonably necessary for the purposes identified elsewhere above, Moder may disclose your personal information to the extent that it is required to do so by law, in connection with any legal proceedings or prospective legal proceedings, and in order to establish, exercise or defend its legal rights.
Securing your data
Moder will take reasonable technical and organisational precautions to prevent the loss, misuse or alteration of your personal information.
Moder will store all the personal information you provide on its secure servers, which are owned by webhosting.com.
Information relating to electronic transactions entered into via this mobile app will be protected by encryption technology.

In addition, personal information that you submit for publication on the mobile app will be published on the internet and may be available around the world.
You agree to such cross-border transfers of personal information.

You will be alerted of changes to this privacy policy and acceptance of the new terms will be required for continued use of the mobile app.
Other mobile apps

Moder is not responsible for the privacy policies or practices of any third party.
